title: Unable to Start Application on this device: Appium directory is invalid
description: Katalon Studio cannot locate the provided Appium directory.Double check your Appium directory to make sure it should be as shown below (Windows > Katalon Studio Preferences > Mobile > Appium Directory).C (Katalon Studio > Preferences > Mobile > Appium Directory)./usr/local/lib/nodemodules/appium
